meanings.sent1: The lanky boy struggled to fit into the small desk.
meanings.sent2: The basketball player was lanky and could reach the hoop easily.
meanings.sent3: The lanky giraffe tried to dance but kept tripping over its own legs.
meanings.sent4: Her lanky shadow stretched across the pavement as she walked under the streetlights.
meanings.sent5: The lanky tree swayed in the wind, looking like a giant stick figure.

meanings.definition: having an awkwardly long and lean appearance
meanings.sent1: The lanky cat stretched out lazily in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The model had a lanky figure that stood out on the runway.
meanings.sent3: The lanky scarecrow in the field made the birds laugh with its long limbs.
meanings.sent4: His lanky fingers moved swiftly over the piano keys, creating beautiful music.
meanings.sent5: The lanky branches of the willow tree reached towards the ground, creating a curtain of leaves.
